item.description: Come down to the Bill McElwain Sugar House to celebrate the Maple Sugaring Season at our Sugaring Off Festival featuring a pancake breakfast, coffee, maple sugar treats, bake sale, live music, tours of our Sugar House in full operation and of course, our own maple syrup. Â The event runs from 9am to 12pm.
item.how_to_find_us: Parking available in the Weston Middle School parking lot. Follow the signs and the steam.
item.why: Come see the Bill McElwain sugarhouse in opperation and taste our rich maple syrup.
item.name: Land's Sake Sugaring Off Festival
